page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO OUR BLOCK
page.content: This block,on the outskirts of Ashford, is primarily a farming area.The undulating landscape contains a large proportion of the Hinxhill Estate and the Mersham Hatch Estate, the latter being owned by the Brabourne family.A part of Hatch Park falls within this block,and this amenity is enjoyed by the children looked after by the Caldecott Community.12.39 hectares of the Houchin Estate was sold to the South Eastern Area Health Authority for the site of the William Harvey Hospital. The population of this block is low, comprising one village- Hinxhill-with only 17 houses and a church. The area of greatest density is The Street, Willesborough. Over the rest of the area housing is scattered dwellings attached to farms.Communications are along narrow country lanes.
